org.usc.daos.base
Class BaseDaoSupport<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport
          org.usc.daos.base.BaseHibernateDaoSupport
              org.usc.daos.base.BaseDaoSupport<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, IBaseDao<T>
public abstract class BaseDaoSupport<T>
extends BaseHibernateDaoSupport
implements IBaseDao<T>

DAO层封装使用了泛型，包含常用的CURD和分页操作

Author:
ShunLi
Notes:
Created on 2010-1-24
Revision of last commit:$Revision: 634 $
Author of last commit:$Author: nhjsjmz@gmail.com $
